# Welcome {.unnumbered}

Welcome to the online version of “Data Visualization for Social Science” by <a href="https://alhdzsz.net/" target="_blank">Alfredo Hernandez Sanchez</a>. This book offers a gentle introduction to data visualization using R and -- occasionally -- python. In this book you will learn how to make beautiful, informative, and reproducible visualizations with examples from different social sciences. 

## Contact {.unnumbered}

This book is in open review. If you have any questions, comments or suggestions; please contact me by [email](mailto:alhdzsz@gmail.com) or report an issue on GitHub.
